original_text: And they set in it four rows of stones: the first row was a sardius, a topaz, and a carbuncle: this was the first row.
korean_text: 그것에 네 줄 보석을 물렸으니 곧 홍보석 황옥 녹주옥이 첫 줄이요

sentences.original_text: And they set in it four rows of stones
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그 안에 네 줄의 보석을 두었으니

sentences.original_text: the first row was a sardius
